original: @52b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @52b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: bo dhi tsitta ma h'a su kha a'am na ya /
analyzed: bo dhi tsitta ma h'a su kha a'am na ya /
translated: Bodhicittamahāsukha-oṃnāya

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:🔽The Oral Instruction of the Bliss of Bodhicitta

original: byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i man ngag / bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i man ngag / bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhicitta of great bliss.

original: gsang rgyud mtha' dag las man ngag gang pa'i don /
analyzed: gsang rgyud mtha' dag las man ngag gang pa'i don /
translated: The meaning of the pith instructions that are complete in all the secret tantras

original: byang chub kyi sems 'da' ka ma'i man ngag 'di ltar lags te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems 'da' ka ma'i man ngag 'di ltar lags te /
translated: is the bodhicitta instruction for the moment of death, which is as follows:

original: 'chi 'pho dus su 'di ltar ro //
analyzed: 'chi 'pho dus su 'di ltar ro //
translated: At the time of death, it is like this.

original: da ltar bdag gi lus khyab par gnas pa'i sems 'di ni 'ubs kyis 'dus nas /
analyzed: da ltar bdag gi lus khyab par gnas pa'i sems 'di ni 'ubs kyis 'dus nas /
translated: The mind that pervades my body right now is gathered into a ball

original: snying ga'i dkyil na 'od mtshon gang ba cig gnas so //
analyzed: snying ga'i dkyil na 'od mtshon gang ba cig gnas so //
translated: and abides in the center of the heart as a thumb-sized light.

original: yi ge shis pas 'od du mi lta ste /
analyzed: yi ge shis pas 'od du mi lta ste /
translated: Do not look at the light of the syllable hūṃ;

original: h'um yungs 'bru tsam cig lhang nger gnas so //
analyzed: h'um yungs 'bru tsam cig lhang nger gnas so //
translated: a hūṃ the size of a mustard seed abides vividly.

original: de nas tsher ba dang bral drod shor te /
analyzed: de nas tsher ba dang bral drod shor te /
translated: Then, free from pulsation and warmth,

original: 'jig rten pa'i spyod yul dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i spyod yul dang bral ba'o //
translated: it is free from the domain of worldly experience.

original: de tsam na 'od mthing ga de snying gi dkyil nas /
analyzed: de tsam na 'od mthing ga de snying gi dkyil nas /
translated: At that moment, the blue light in the center of the heart

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi gsang ba'i lam g-yas kyi srog rtsa dar dkar gyi skud pa 'dra ba'i nang nas yar yengs kyis byung ste /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi gsang ba'i lam g-yas kyi srog rtsa dar dkar gyi skud pa 'dra ba'i nang nas yar yengs kyis byung ste /
translated: The secret path of bodhicitta is the right nāḍī, which is like a white silk thread.

original: spyi bo'i gtsug tu byung /
analyzed: spyi bo'i gtsug tu byung /
translated: The bindu emerges from that and arrives at the crown.

original: ril gyis dril nas /
analyzed: ril gyis dril nas /
translated: It is rolled up into a ball.

original: lhang gis shar tsam na /
analyzed: lhang gis shar tsam na /
translated: When it arises vividly,🔽it is about one fathom above the crown.

original: de nas yar 'dom gang tsam gyis chod nas rnam par dag pa chos kyi pho brang /
analyzed: de nas yar 'dom gang tsam gyis chod nas rnam par dag pa chos kyi pho brang /
translated: In the palace of the totally pure dharma,

original: rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas na /
analyzed: rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas na /
translated: the natural, spontaneously present place,

original: dpal kun du bzang po bzhugs te /
analyzed: dpal kun du bzang po bzhugs te /
translated: Śrī Samantabhadra resides.

original: rang gis khyab gdal ba dang bzhin lhang nge bar te /
analyzed: rang gis khyab gdal ba dang bzhin lhang nge bar te /
translated: One’s own mind is vividly present in the state of Samantabhadra.

original: sku la mdun dang rgyab mi mnga' bar /
analyzed: sku la mdun dang rgyab mi mnga' bar /
translated: Since there is no front or back in the body,🔽it is vividly present in great bliss.

original: bde ba chen po'i nang du lhang nger bzhugs pa dang / bdag gi sems h'um ngam thig le yungs 'bru spyi bo nas yar byung ba gnyis kar sbyin la sbrang bu chags pa'am /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i nang du lhang nger bzhugs pa dang / bdag gi sems h'um ngam thig le yungs 'bru spyi bo nas yar byung ba gnyis kar sbyin la sbrang bu chags pa'am /
translated: The bindu of one’s mind, either in the form of hūṃ or a mustard-seed sized bindu, arises from the crown.🔽The two are mixed, like a bee in a flower,

original: chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa'i tshul du /
analyzed: chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa'i tshul du /
translated: or like water and milk.

original: kun du bzang po dang gnyis gcig tu lhang nger gnas par gyur to //
analyzed: kun du bzang po dang gnyis gcig tu lhang nger gnas par gyur to //
translated: Śrī Samantabhadra and one’s mind are vividly present as one.

original: de ltar chos kyi dbyings kyis gar khyab par kun du bzang pos khyab /
analyzed: de ltar chos kyi dbyings kyis gar khyab par kun du bzang pos khyab /
translated: Thus, wherever the dharmadhātu pervades, Samantabhadra pervades.

original: kun du bzang pos gar khyab par bdag gi sems kyis khyab ste /
analyzed: kun du bzang pos gar khyab par bdag gi sems kyis khyab ste /
translated: Wherever Samantabhadra pervades, one’s mind pervades.

original: gzung 'dzin gyi rnam rtog dang bral nas chos kyi sku thob ste /
analyzed: gzung 'dzin gyi rnam rtog dang bral nas chos kyi sku thob ste /
translated: Free from the concepts of subject and object, one attains the dharmakāya.

original: skyid pa chen po g-yung drung gi gnas su khyab gdal la lhang nge bar gnas so //
analyzed: skyid pa chen po g-yung drung gi gnas su khyab gdal la lhang nge bar gnas so //
translated: One abides in the state of the great bliss of the realm of the self-originated swastika.

original: de'i ngang las mi 'gyur lhang nger gnas pa ni /
analyzed: de'i ngang las mi 'gyur lhang nger gnas pa ni /
translated: Abiding in that state, one abides vividly without changing.

original: rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba mur thug pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba mur thug pa'o //
translated: That is the culmination of the view of the Great Perfection.

original: de'i ngang las sa ler gnas pa ni /
analyzed: de'i ngang las sa ler gnas pa ni /
translated: Abiding in that state, one abides clearly.

original: rdzogs pa chen po'i bsgom pa mthar phyin pa'o //🔽de'i ngang las yud tsam bar @53a * //
analyzed: rdzogs pa chen po'i bsgom pa mthar phyin pa'o // de'i ngang las yud tsam bar @53a * //
translated: That is the culmination of the meditation of the Great Perfection.

original: mi 'da' ba ni /
analyzed: mi 'da' ba ni /
translated: Abiding in that state, one does not pass beyond the moment.

original: rdzogs pa chen bo'i dam tshig mthar phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa chen bo'i dam tshig mthar phyin pa'o //
translated: That is the culmination of the samaya of the Great Perfection.

original: de lta bu'i don la sems rtse gcig tu bsgom mo //
analyzed: de lta bu'i don la sems rtse gcig tu bsgom mo //
translated: One should meditate one-pointedly on such a meaning.

original: byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i man ngag rdzogs so /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i man ngag rdzogs so /
translated: The esoteric instruction of the bodhicitta of great bliss is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i pam k'a ra shr'i dzny'a na nyid dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pho brang byang chub 'od kyis zhus pa'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i pam k'a ra shr'i dzny'a na nyid dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pho brang byang chub 'od kyis zhus pa'o//
